methods.name: Run
methods.logic: Executes the optimization phase. It takes a PipelineData object (likely containing the intermediate representation of the code being compiled) and a temporary Zone allocator as input. The implementation details are not visible in this header file.

constants.name: DECL_TURBOSHAFT_PHASE_CONSTANTS(Optimize)
constants.logic: Macro defining phase-specific constants. The actual definitions are elsewhere, but this likely sets up names and IDs to identify this specific 'Optimize' phase within the Turboshaft pipeline.
